--0-1399529894-1263210595=:27872
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Hi All,

I am crawling websites using heritrix 1.14.3 on windows. I can see a lot of "FileNotFoundExcept ion@MirrorWriter" errors
in the "local-errors" logs. On analysis, it was observed that the error
is because the URL contains some special characters which are not
allowed in file names in windows, for example : < > \ ? | * "
etc. I have tried the character map setting as proposed in heritrix
webUI. But it does not seem to yield the results. Please let me
know some solution to this problem. It is really important for my
exercise as a lot of the desired URL's have one or another special
characters in the name.

Thanks and Regards,
Lucky Goyal



      
--0-1399529894-1263210595=:27872
